plugin.name: oswitch
plugin._long: A plugin to change the focused output.

option.name: next_output
option._long: Moves focus to the next output with the specified activator.

option.name: next_output_with_win
option._long: Moves focus to the next output with the focused window with the specified activator.

option.name: previous_output
option._long: Moves focus to the previous output with the specified activator.

option.name: previous_output_with_win
option._long: Moves focus to the previous output with the focused window with the specified activator.

option.name: swap_output
option._long: Swap active window with the window on the next output. Focuses original output window.

option.name: swap_output_previous
option._long: Swap active window with the window on the previous output. Focuses original output window.
